name: processtemplatetask
description: [DEPRICATED] Imports an XML Process to VSTS.
author: naked Agility Limited - Martin Hinshelwood

groups.name: Overrides
groups.displayName: Override defaults set in your Process Template .zip

inputs.name: VstsXmlProcessService
inputs.label: VSTS XML Process Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: The endpoint should contain both the Token for access as well a the URL of the VSTS Account that you want to connect to. You will need an endpoint per VSTS Account.

inputs.name: processFile
inputs.label: Process Template
inputs.helpMarkDown: Search for one or more process templates to upload. Support wildcards.

inputs.name: overrideProcessGuid
inputs.label: Override Process GUID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The GUID of the process you would like to overwrite. Note that if there is significant diference between the in place template and the new one you will need to do a manual upload.

inputs.name: overrideProcessName
inputs.label: Override Process Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Override the name of the Process so that you can tell the Imported ones apart since there is likley to be one per team project.
